column1: '''''The New York Times Magazine'' 15 January 1967''' is an issue of ''[[Wikipedia:The New York Times Magazine
The article "The Prevalence of Hobbits" by Philip Norman includes extracts from an [[Index:Interviews with J.R.R. Tolkien
Another (similar but not identical) article based on the same interview was published on the same date in ''[[The Sunday Times Magazine 15 January 1967
